text: Datong () is a city in Shanxi province, People's Republic of China. The number of inhabitants is 3,318,057, as of the 2010 census. The city is an important distribution and warehousing center for Shanxi, Hebei and Inner Mongolia.China Briefing Business Guide . China-briefing.com. Retrieved on 25 February 2014. ==References== Category:Cities in China Category:Shanxi
title: Datong
